name: UgLee Games Classics - Treasure Adventure - 2010
description:
Max, a blue fox, ventures through a land of monsters in search of the ultimate adventure, a treasure adventure!

[ Developed in Spring 2010 ]

This is the first game in the UgLee Games Classic series. UgLee Games Classic games are designed to help me improve and experiment in programming and design. All games in the UgLee Games Classic series are free to play.
